spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Readme
spec_data.Description:
This module filters POD to generate a README file, by using POD commands to
specify which parts are included or excluded from the README file.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:18:06 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Intelligently generate a README file from POD
